text.0:
An article claiming that Nollywood actress Genevieve Nnaji has endorsed Bobi Wine's bid for Uganda's presidency is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: The Facebook page that made the endorsement does not belong to the actress: https://t.co/sydaH57HrQ
text.1:
:police_car_light: HOAX: A Facebook account using the name and image of a former commissioner of Kenya's Independent Electoral and Boundaries Commission (IEBC) that posted a doctored photo is fake.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: Dr Roselyne Akombe has distanced herself from the account: https://t.co/Yms1Y6YrhQ
text.2:
A tweet claiming that bars and clubs are set to close as Kenya goes into lockdown again is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:magnifying_glass_tilted_right: While the government did announce new restrictions, bars and clubs have not been asked to close: https://t.co/Can3OQ56gy
text.3:
A photo claiming to show that the Tigray People Liberation Front in Ethiopia was trying to flee with cash in suitcases and cartons is :cross_mark: FALSE.

:dollar_banknote: The photo is of $10 million found in the house of a government minister in Zimbabwe in November 2017: https://t.co/gYsM2JTmXg
